trends: There have been 42 other sightings in Scottsdale
There were no other sightings in Scottsdale on or around December 6th 2008
divs: Sighting DetailsDriving south on Pima Road near McDonald. Looked up and saw what I thought was a plane. BUT noticed it did not have wings or tail. It did not move but I watched it for about a second then it disappeared. I always look at the sky. Figured it was a ship.
